attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value of the radio group

attributes.name: orientation
attributes.description: The visual orientation of the group

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Setting this value will set the name value for all child radios

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the radio group and child radios

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: When true, the child radios will be immutable by user interaction
